title: 教你们如何修改用户名
author: MCQJK
txt_content:
https://account.mojang.com/me/
这是修改用户名的地址
登陆后，按Ctrl+F搜索“(Change) ”不带双引号

Please note! When you log in to Minecraft or on minecraft.net, use XXXXX@qq.com instead of your profile name.

GameSinceProfile NameDownload Game
Minecraft2 May, 2014XXXX (Change) Windows   Mac OS X Linux 
ScrollsNot yetCreate free demo profile 
找到后，打开连接
然后就像这样.在New profile name 输入你要改成的用户名，在password输入你的MC密码。每30天可以修改一次
Rename ProfileChoose your new Minecraft nameCurrent name: XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX 
This name will be displayed to other players in the game.
If you change your name now you have to wait 30 days before you can change it again, so please choose wisely! 
New profile name  Check availability Confirm this change with your account password.
